summary: Methodical Workforce/Data Analyst with expertise in Python, SQL, Alteryx, and Machine Learning/AI. Skilled in automation, reporting, and SharePoint integration. Passionate about building scalable solutions that improve efficiency and decision-making.

experience.description: Built automated pipelines in Python & Alteryx for SLA tracking, workload forecasting, and SharePoint ticket assignment. Developed machine learning models for call center forecasting and agent performance insights.
Monitored fraud patterns, automated reporting workflows, and designed dashboards for risk mitigation.
Delivered client solutions and achieved sales targets while supporting digital adoption initiatives.

projects.title: SharePoint Ticket Automation
projects.description: Developed Python + Alteryx pipeline to extract SharePoint tickets, classify priority, and auto-assign to agents via round-robin logic.

projects.title: Call Center Forecasting
projects.description: Implemented SARIMA, LSTM, and Prophet models for predicting call volumes, SLA, and agent requirements.

projects.title: Reporting Automation
projects.description: Designed workflows that automated repetitive reporting tasks, reducing manual effort by 70%.

projects.title: Chatbot Resume Assistant
projects.description: Built a personal chatbot to answer recruiter questions based on structured resume data.

education.degree: Executive PG in Data Science & Artificial Intelligence

certifications.name: Executive Post Graduate Certification in Data Science & AI
